entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:32 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
